H0.text: In the British Parliament, who presides over the election of a new Speaker. Lord Chancellor

H1.text: In the British Parliament, who presides over the election of a new Speaker. Father of the House

H2.text: In the British Parliament, who presides over the election of a new Speaker. Deputy Speaker

H3.text: In the British Parliament, who presides over the election of a new Speaker. Alterspr√§sident

A4.text: Since that time, as recommended by a Select committee, the Father of the House (the member of the House with the longest period of unbroken service who is not a minister) becomes the presiding officer.
